scripts.package: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] main.js UserCredentials.js ImportantNews.js RestUtils.js Steps.js ServerInfo.js -o bundle.js
scripts.autopackage: watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] main.js UserCredentials.js ImportantNews.js RestUtils.js Steps.js ServerInfo.js -o bundle.js
